card_text: 3 Level 6 monsters$NIf a monster you control battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card once per battle; your battling monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, during that damage calculation only.
